name: Hygge
description:
Last year, my girlfriend and I moved to Denmark with her two children. This is a short text game about the ups and downs of moving to another country, daylight, school, kids, coffee, lifting weights, learning new languages, working from home, and travelling the world.

You can play the game in your browser directly above. I recommend using the full screen button to maximize it on the page.

You can also download a copy via the link below. 

If you like the game, consider donating via the link above or the download link below. Also consider sharing the game so that others can hear about it!

It should take somewhere between 10-20 minutes depending on how quick of a reader you are.

Depending on how it goes, I may be adding more chapters to the game as more time passes.
